meanings.definition: To assist or help together with someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The students coassisted in cleaning up the classroom after school.
meanings.sent2: The team coassisted in completing the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The siblings coassisted in making a mess in the kitchen while trying to bake cookies.
meanings.sent4: The ants coassisted in carrying the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent5: The firefighters coassisted in rescuing the cat from the tree.

meanings.definition: To work jointly or in cooperation with others.
meanings.sent1: The neighbors coassisted in organizing a community clean-up event.
meanings.sent2: The countries coassisted in providing aid to the disaster-stricken region.
meanings.sent3: The birds coassisted in creating a beautiful melody with their chirping.
meanings.sent4: The gears coassisted in turning the machinery smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The dancers coassisted in performing a flawless routine on stage.
